attributes.action: what is the point fo these petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You never do anything to solve the problems we have anyway...like unemployment, poverty etc.
Its all hype and no substance

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
